title: Employment Agreement

obligations.description: Serve as Senior Software Engineer, develop enterprise-level applications, mentor junior developers, and make architectural decisions
Provide full health insurance coverage and 401(k) with 5% employer match

special_terms: Employee agrees to maintain confidentiality of all proprietary information
Non-Compete Period: 12 months post-employment within 100-mile radius of headquarters
termination_conditions: Either party may terminate with 30 days written notice
Severance: 3 months base salary upon termination without cause
Cause for termination includes breach of confidentiality, gross negligence, or policy violation
